Government Tender Announcement:

Supply of a Stainless Steel Jacketed Radial Arm Door Autoclave for CL3 Laboratories

The National Research Council Canada's Human Health Therapeutics Research Center is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply of a double-sided (pass-through), radial arm locking door stainless steel jacketed sterilizer (steam autoclave) to meet the requirements of our Containment Level 3 operating license issued by the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) and the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

Key Project Details

  • Tender Reference Number: CB-7316-10440920
  • Tender Solicitation Number: 23-58043
  • Tender Closing Date: August 14, 2023, 14:00:00
  • Expected Contract Start Date: August 28, 2023
  • Expected Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

Project Description

The proposed equipment must be suitable for CL3 containment laboratories and meet the requirements outlined in the current edition (3rd) of the Canadian Biosafety Standard (CBS). Key specifications include:

  • Double-sided (pass-through) radial arm locking door design
  • Stainless steel jacket and chamber
  • Biological sealing flange or bio-seal for containment
  • All penetrations through the bio-seal must be fully potted to prevent air leaks

Procurement Method

The procurement method for this project is competitive, open bidding. The selection criteria for the tender will be based on the lowest price submitted.
